description: Numbers represented by quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 4, 1; 1, 6 ], divided by 2.
comments: Nonnegative integers of the form 2x^2 + x*y + 3y^2, a positive definite quadratic form of discriminant -23. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 09 2014
links: N. J. A. Sloane et al., Binary Quadratic Forms and OEIS (Index to related sequences, programs, references)
crossrefs: For primes see A106867. Cf. A028958, A033217.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Mar 29 2000
